outline:
1. to drink
    1. (Qal)
      1. to drink
        1. of drinking cup of God's wrath, of slaughter, of wicked deeds (fig)
      2. to feast
    2. (Niphal) to be drunk
kjv_def: [idiom] assuredly, banquet, [idiom] certainly, drink(-er, -ing), drunk ([idiom] -ard), surely. (Prop. intensive of H8248 (שָׁקָה).)
